subtests.name: Test that 'resize: block' is supported.
Test 'resize: block' with 'writing-mode: horizontal-tb; direction: ltr; '.
Test 'resize: block' with 'writing-mode: horizontal-tb; direction: rtl; '.
Test 'resize: block' with 'writing-mode: vertical-rl; direction: rtl; '.
Test 'resize: block' with 'writing-mode: sideways-rl; direction: rtl; '.
Test 'resize: block' with 'writing-mode: vertical-rl; direction: ltr; '.
Test 'resize: block' with 'writing-mode: sideways-rl; direction: ltr; '.
Test 'resize: block' with 'writing-mode: vertical-lr; direction: rtl; '.
Test 'resize: block' with 'writing-mode: sideways-lr; direction: ltr; '.
Test 'resize: block' with 'writing-mode: vertical-lr; direction: ltr; '.
Test 'resize: block' with 'writing-mode: sideways-lr; direction: rtl; '.
Test that 'resize: inline' is supported.
Test 'resize: inline' with 'writing-mode: horizontal-tb; direction: ltr; '.
Test 'resize: inline' with 'writing-mode: horizontal-tb; direction: rtl; '.
Test 'resize: inline' with 'writing-mode: vertical-rl; direction: rtl; '.
Test 'resize: inline' with 'writing-mode: sideways-rl; direction: rtl; '.
Test 'resize: inline' with 'writing-mode: vertical-rl; direction: ltr; '.
Test 'resize: inline' with 'writing-mode: sideways-rl; direction: ltr; '.
Test 'resize: inline' with 'writing-mode: vertical-lr; direction: rtl; '.
Test 'resize: inline' with 'writing-mode: sideways-lr; direction: ltr; '.
Test 'resize: inline' with 'writing-mode: vertical-lr; direction: ltr; '.
Test 'resize: inline' with 'writing-mode: sideways-lr; direction: rtl; '.
